description.narrative: UNICEF program of cooperation is adequately resourced the resources are used for intended purposes and stakeholders receive timely quality reports., which contributes to Corporate External Relations And Partnerships, Communication And Resource Mobilization, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

title.narrative: UNICEF Programmes in Afghanistan (Adolescent Health and Development)
Afghanistan Country Programme Document 2015-2019 Results Matrix
Afghanistan Country Programme Document 2015-2019 extended until 3/2022
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Afghanistan 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF program of cooperation is adequately resourced; the resources are used for intended purposes and stakeholders receive timely quality reports.

description.narrative: The office mobilized 54 per cent ($152m) of its annual ORR and HAC budgets ($281m) through existing and new partnerships, and developed a discrete pipeline into 2021. In addition, 52 per cent of its COVID-19 appeal is funded ($43m/$83m). All 37 donor reports on VISION were submitted in time and checked for quality. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:30/07/2020
